name: Ultra Fencing
description:
Ultra Fencing is a 2D fighting game that puts some extra spice on the classic sword fight.  Lunge and parry to score touches on your opponent while also charging your super meter to unleash powerful super moves!  Be the first player to score fifteen points, or have the higher score when Edvard Grieg’s “In the Hall of the Mountain King” comes to an end!

Made with Unity.
